news.title: Listen to Thundercat and Remi Wolf’s New Song “Children of the Baked Potato”
news.summary: Thundercat has also shared the new solo track “I Wish I Didn’t Waste Your Time”

news.title: Massive Attack Announce Brazil Concert Supporting Indigenous Rights and Climate Justice
news.summary: Timed to coincide with the COP30 International Climate Change Summit, the São Paulo show with Sepultura side project Cavalera is designed to platform Indigenous Amazonians, the bands say

news.title: Jade, KP Skywalka, George Riley, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat

news.title: Drive-By Truckers Announce The Definitive Decoration Day, Share Songs: Listen
news.summary: A new edition of the Southern rock band’s first album with Jason Isbell

news.title: Emmys 2025: Christopher Lennertz Wins Outstanding Original Music and Lyrics for The Boys
news.summary: Songs from Agatha All Along, Andor, SNL50: The Anniversary Special, and Will & Harper were also recognized in the category

news.title: Emmys 2025: Theodore Shapiro Wins Outstanding Music Composition for Severance
news.summary: Andor, Based on a True Story, Cobra Kai, The Studio, and The White Lotus were also recognized for Outstanding Music Composition for a Series (Original Dramatic Score)

news.title: Watch the New Trailer for Bruce Springsteen Movie Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere
news.summary: The new clip focuses on Jeremy Allen White as Springsteen and Jeremy Strong as Springsteen’s manager, Jon Landau
